Verb *get*
***********

Documentation for the get verb in */cmds/verbs/get.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``get <items>``
 |  ``get all <items>``
 |  ``get <items> from <container>``
 |  ``get <items> out of <container>``
 |  ``get <items> with <item>``
 |  ``get all from <container>``
 |  ``get all from <container>``

Get, take, carry, pick up items, all of them, or all of them from somewhere.
